resources.string: Check for updates. The UI is defaulted by the SDKs, and an icon is required
Check whether a new version is available. Please call the corrsponding APIs in the child thread
Obtain the update information. Please call the corrsponding APIs in the child thread

Default pop-up interval of the update dialog box: when a new version is available, multiple checks for updates will be triggered in a short time while the update dialog box pops up for only once. The default pop-up interval is 3 days.
Custom update UI (custom pop-up interval of the update dialog box)

Custom pop-up interval of the update dialog box: when a new version is available, multiple checks for updates will be triggered in a short time. The update dialog box will pop up only when the interval between the pop-ups exceeds the custom period (unit: millisecond). Currently, the custom interval is 1 minite.
Custom update UI (custom pop-up interval of the update dialog box)

Note:\n1.when the update mode is set as \"multiple times"\or\"forced", the configured pop-up interval will not take effect. For each check for updates, if there is a new version available, the update dialog box will pop up.\n2.The abovementioned pop-up interval of the update dialog box refers to the callback interval of the \"showUpgradeDialog\" method.
Update in progress. Please try later.
It is currently the latest version
The pop-up time of two upgrades is less than the set interval
An error occurred in detecting the new version
版本更新（英语版本用户自定义）
